name: craniosacral
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to a type of treatment for reducing pain and tension that involves gently pressing the head and the base of the back : Craniosacral therapy is a hands-on treatment developed in 1975 by osteopathic physician John Upledger.
More examplesFewer examplesCraniosacral therapy can be good for anxiety.In craniosacral massage gentle pressure is applied to the head and spine.As a craniosacral therapist, she provides help in the form of gentle, low-pressure touching.Placing their hands on the patient is thought to tune the therapist into the so-called craniosacral system.
